commit message:
Initial directory structure.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%401

Initial commit.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%404

Moved timeline loading from inside switch into its own method in service.
Updated comments in main activity.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%405

Storing sent times as longs instead of as strings for sorting to work right.
Made sure that preferences are reloaded when loading the timeline.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%406

Added automatic update preference and made update frequency a child.
Updated service to better handle updates and preferences.
Reformatted sources.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%407

Removed sample timeline, no longer necessary.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%408

Added onResume to TweetList.
Made sure that service handles sent dates correctly now that they are longs.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%409

Added tweet view.
Updated the way notifications are presented to the user.
Notifications are now sent from the service instead of from the activity.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4010

Added class for presenting relative time/date.
Added ViewBinder for Tweet list to add date parsing among other things.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4011

Added comments to XML files.
Cleaned up resource files and made sure they validate.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4012

Cleaned up TweetView to ensure that views are created properly.
Fixed context bug in AndTweetService by setting default action and category on intent.
Cleaned up Tweet activity.
Cleaned up manifest.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4013

Cleaned up sources to eliminate warnings.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4014

Added basic posting functionality with reply tracking.
Connection now supports POST for status updates.
TweetList Send button now posts the message if longer than 0.
Updated version to 0.1.1.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4015

Added support for LED alerts.
Added options menu item for reloading timeline. Still not active.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4016

Moved log message for new tweets into if block.
Added more verbose comments to the Connection class.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4017

Added parsing of update frequency for the summary of the preference element.
Added more options for the update frequency list.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4018

Added source parameter for AndTweet.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4019

Added getFriends method to the Connection class.
Fixed AndTweet.Users table, not named authors, named users.
Added experimental checking of user credentials to Preferences activity.
Added loading of friends list from table to TweetList activity.
Cleaned up cursor usage in TweetList.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4020

Made some modifications to the data loading methods.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4021

Added fix for times in the future to say 'just now'

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4022

Made sure that password text entry works as intended.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4023

Added progress bar display when posting a message.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4024

Removed friends.json since it was only used for testing. Now relies on fetching friends list from Twitter.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4025

Added manual reload functionality.
Added threading support for posting messages with progress dialogs.
Added class for parsing the friends timeline to the data namespace.
Added strings used by dialogs and toasts.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4026

Updated log tag identifiers to make sure that they are uniform.
Added credentials checking to preference screen.
Made sure that automatic updates are always disabled unless credentials are present.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4027

Added new exception class for connection exceptions.
Cleaned up database connections. Apparently switching view from portrait to landscape freezes/stops an activity, and if using a managed query cursor, this will actually close the cursor in the middle of an active operation.
Moved all CPU intensive tasks into Runnables.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4028

Fixed a bug where tweet views wouldn't work because it was trying to use the managed cursor features that were removed in a previous commit.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4032

Added 15 minutes to the fetch frequency.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4036

Added support for styles.
Added better handling of timeline loading/insertions.
Added instant insertion upon successful status message post to twitter.
Added custom QueryFilterProvider enabled SimpleCursorAdapter class, SearchableCursorAdapter.
Switched all relevant cursors in TweetList to managed cursors through managedQuery.
Updated names of parameters in tweet list items and tweet to match.
Added future menu options with a message stating that they are not implemented yet.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4037

Cleaned up TweetList.
Added string values for a couple of raw strings.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4038

Added AndTweet icon.
Added BroadcastReceiver for on boot events.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4039

Added theme support to Tweet.java and TweetList.java.
Added theme selector to preferences.
Restructured preference screen with additional screens for groups.
Added source column to AndTweetProvider.java.
Added support for source column in Tweet.java.
Fixed hourly display in RelativeTime.java.
Added support for closing cursors manually in SearchableCursorAdapter.java.
Added better handling of connection and authentication errors in Connection.java.
Cleaned up managed cursor usage and replaced with own life cycle management. Avoids crashes and cursors not finalizing.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4040

Cleaned up namespaces and filenames.

Added in reply to to list and detail view.

Moved shared functionality into its own class with a new interface, ITimelineActivity.java. All classes that extend TimelineActivity.java will automatically inherit this interface and will be required to implement methods shared by all timelines.

Added custom progress animation for timeline.

Timelines will now load more items if available when bottom of list is reached.

Switched TweetListActivity.java to extend ListActivity instead of Activity.

Upgraded database to support new fields.

Cleaned up provider in an effort to make it cleaner and sparser.

Added loading animation to list view to indicate that more items are loading.

Cleaned up dialog code to ensure that it persists through layout changes and the like.

Cleaned up comments in several files.

--HG--
rename : src/com/xorcode/andtweet/view/Preferences.java => src/com/xorcode/andtweet/PreferencesActivity.java
rename : src/com/xorcode/andtweet/view/Tweet.java => src/com/xorcode/andtweet/TweetActivity.java
rename : src/com/xorcode/andtweet/view/TweetList.java => src/com/xorcode/andtweet/TweetListActivity.java
rename : src/com/xorcode/andtweet/data/AndTweet.java => src/com/xorcode/andtweet/data/AndTweetDatabase.java
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4046

Removing unused namespace.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4052

Added Apache 2.0 license file.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4053

Added license block.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4054

Added license block.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4055

Added resources for splash screen.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4056

Added strings for splash resources.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4057

Added splash screen.
Added animations used for splash screen and read more screen.
Updated loading message footer in list activities to use a progress bar and also to display properly when list is being scrolled to the bottom.
Cleaned up connection errors and made sure that they return proper user responses.
Removed progress_small.xml because it is no longer needed.
Added Direct Messages activity.
Added direct messages data connection class.
Updated loadTheme() method in TimelineActivity.java and TweetActivity.java to support using the light theme.
Switched all dialog windows over to using onCreateDialog.
Added light theme to preferences.
Added light theme to attributes and theme.
Added text editor color to theme and attributes.
Added IDs to the items in tweetlist.xml.
Updated item_loading.xml to use ProgressBar instead of a custom animation.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4059

Fixed typo in notification message for direct messages.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4061

Set automatic update default to 15 minutes. Based on suggestion in issue #4.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4064

Started using Alarm Manager in order to ensure that new data is fetched when automatic updates are enabled.
Service is now created automatically when any of the timeline activities start. The service will be run on a schedule based on the setting in preferences using a repeating alarm.
Added permission for wake lock.
Moved date format from DirectMessages.java and FriendTimeline.java into TimelineActivity.java.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4065

Made sure that text edit field remains the right color when theme is switched between light and dark.
Added padding to tweet list items and the tweet view.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4069

Moved main menu into XML file.
Added icons for main menu items.
Added new main menu items and split up messages and main timeline.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4070

Whitespace fix.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4071

Fixed timeline updates working correctly when posting replies and updates.
Started using alarm manager to ensure that automatic updates run as intended.
Added informational titles to activities to show additional information.
Moved main menu into an XML file.
Added new page to the Splash pages.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4072

Fixed connections that use run time to not use it if it is 0.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4073

Fixed last run times to work. Had forgotten to actually read them in from preferences before setting them again.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4074

Fixed vibration not working. Was using the wrong preference name.
Added search feature for friend timeline and direct messages.
Added handling for twitter connection exceptions such as 401, and 503.
Added notification sound selection to preferences.
Added display of message when twitter is over capacity.
Updated menu to reflect the new search options.
Finished replies screen. Uses search to look for @ replies.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4075

Commented out menu options that are not being used yet.
Updated the intro splash texts to reflect recent changes to the code.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4076

The twitter API had changed and verify_credentials now resides within the account section. Also added better reporting of 404's.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4077

Updated to version 0.1.17. Had to release a quick fix for some issues.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4078

Preparing for 0.1.18 release.
Added reply notifications.
Added options to preferences to control what notifications to receive, tweets, replies, and DMs.
Moved hard-coded strings from preferences.xml into strings.xml.
Fixed direct messages Connection last date run bug.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4082

Removed unnecessary log messages.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4086

Preparing for 0.1.19 release.
Added custom title to be able to display Twitter rate limit in header.
Moved indeterminate progress display into a progress dialog for manual reload.
Added handling of reply timeline. Integrates with regular tweets, using integer to determine type.
Updated the table definitions for tweets and users to prepare for future functionality.
Upgraded database to version 7.
Updated application version to 0.1.19.
Fixed thread-safe issue with SimpleDateFormat, made function calls synchronized.
Added layout for timeline list items with avatars. Will be used in future version.
Added rate limit check URL to connection handler.
Added replies URL to connection handler.
Added replies loading to the connection handler.
Added support for setting the limit for the timeline functions in the connection handler.
Added dialog question to ask user about using SD card for database.
Extended the SQLiteOpenHelper in AndTweetProvider to support custom database locations.
Added checks to ensure that the user is notified when the external storage is either unmounted or mounted read-only.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4092

Removed commented out code.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4093

Ensured that database throws exceptions in the event that the external storage is unmounted or read-only.
Storing database externally in its own directory.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4094

Cleaned up synchronized usage.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4095

Switched external storage notification to using a dialog instead of a toast. Added dialog for missing external storage.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4096

Added special handling for external storage to ensure that the user is alerted when it is not present.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4097

Added strings for the dialog for missing external storage.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4098

UPDATES:
* Commented out usage of external storage. Not very stable. Possibly something to do with the database acquiring an exclusive lock on the drive when writing.
* Updated connections to twitter to use since_id instead of since. The since parameter has been deprecated and does not work any longer.
* Removed checks for external storage.
* Made sure that manual reload also updates the last stored since_id.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%4099

Updated version number.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40100

Renamed replies to Mentions.
Added network timeout handling to GET and POST methods.
Updated version.

--HG--
rename : res/drawable/ic_menu_replies.png => res/drawable/ic_menu_mentions.png
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40102

Added minSdkVersion which is now required by the Android Market.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40103

Updating project for 1.5 SDK.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40106

Added Retweet capability.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40107

Updated version.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40108

Added favorite capability, create/destroy.
Added destroy status capability.
Updated splash screen with absolute paths.
Updated tweetlist.xml with background to work in 1.5.
Changed input field in tweetlist.xml to better support 1.5.
Updated tweetlist_item.xml with new icon for favorite indication.
Added window background attribute.
Added strings for the new capabilities.
Updated themes to use the new window background attribute.
Added new fields to the AndTweetProvider database.
Updated service and activities to handle the new fields and the new capabilities such as favorites.
Updated the TweetBinder adapter binder to handle favorites.
Updated the FriendTimeline database calls to handle favorites.
Fixed FriendTimeline insertions of TWEET_TYPE.
Added new methods to Connection class to support favorites and destroying statuses.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40111

Accidentally had the upgrade for < version 8 inside the version 7 upgrade block. Moved outside.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40112

Switching to startService instead of alarm manager.
Using a partial wake lock in the service to prevent CPU from stopping.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40113

No longer need persistent activity permission.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40114

Added relative time strings to the string assets.
Updated timeout values.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40115

Added German translation, courtesy of codename.matrix.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40116

Fixed issue 19: Notifications for mentions does not work.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40117

Added better handling for connection exceptions.
Made sure that user-dismissed dialogs does not give errors when the application attempts to dismiss them.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40118

Ensured that text limits update no matter what type of keyboard is in use.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40119

Fixed date bug where tweets would get the current date by default because the calendar date parser would fail. Thanks to Benjamin Schirmer for the fix.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40120

Benjamin Schirmer added direct message translations.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40121

Fixed issue 16: Focus list instead of textbox.
Made a check to make sure that a hardware keyboard exists before trying to auto-focus the input field. Also made sure that the keyboard is not automatically visible by configuring the activity through the manifest.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40122

Made sure that dates are imported correctly for direct messages.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40123

Updated version. Releasing 0.2.4.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40124

Fix for typo in German translation (Fixes issue 21)

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40126

added ant

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40127

added history size/time preferences

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40128

Committing what didn't synchronize well during previous commit...

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40130

Committing what didn't synchronize well during previous commit...

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40131

Reverting  accidental changes to the trunk...

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40132

Merging widget branch to the trunk

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40136

Two tasks done (at least, partially):
1. task 35: Add Russian language user interface to AndTweet
http://code.google.com/p/andtweet/issues/detail?id=35
2. task 29: AndTweet keeps the Android from going to sleep
http://code.google.com/p/andtweet/issues/detail?id=29

rename : res/values/arrays.xml => res/values-ru/arrays.xml
rename : res/values/strings.xml => res/values-ru/strings.xml
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40137

Fixed the problem that the recurring alarm was not started on reboot.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40138

Removed redundant code and added a bit of logging.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40139

For RelativeTime class improved phrase formatting to using {@link I18n#formatQuantityMessage}
FIXED - task 35: Add Russian language user interface to AndTweet
http://code.google.com/p/andtweet/issues/detail?id=35

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40140

Fixed task 28: ActivityNotFoundException while long clicking on private messages
http://code.google.com/p/andtweet/issues/detail?id=28
Now user sees 'Not implemented' toast instead of Error message.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40141

Fix: The service wasn't started automatically at app installation.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40142

Brushed up the lingo concerning the auto updates.

--HG--
extra : convert_revision : svn%3A0f648ebc-ce2a-11dd-a412-a1792178251d/trunk%40143

- Everywhere got rid of e.getMessage() in exception handling, e.g.:
Log.e(TAG, e.getMessage());
because sometimes it produces uncaught exception followed by AtndTweet crash!!!

1. Fixed bug preventing timeline position restore.
2. Fixed errors loading data from the Internet due to parallel OAuth requests. (e.g. during initial loading of the User's timeline)
3. Another pass of timeline code cleaning. Now AndTweet timelines open faster due to less requests and redrawing.
4. Made first step in switching from parallel and, in fact, synchronous requests (Twitter commands) processing to the sequential and queued processing, see {@link com.xorcode.andtweet.TimelineActivity#queueIntent}

Queued tweet sending implemented.
---
1. Queued tweet sending implemented. Now User doesn't have to wait for the 'Command execution on a Server' and may continue reading and writing tweets.
Moreover, the same '(close to the) Guaranteed message delivery' approach works for the other commands also: Timeline reload, 	Favorites creation and deletion.
AndTweet retries to send commands to the server on every automatic update and during any manual command or message (Reload or Status update). User is being notified about number of messages currently in the queue (If Notifications are being enabled).
2. Changes in the application permissions.
Two (location) permissions were removed,	one permission was added to help asynchronous message delivery (ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE).

1. 'Destroy status' and Rate limit request made asynchronous also.</change>
2. Widget shows last time when data was successfully downloaded from the server, not when there was last attempt to do this (maybe it failed...)

1. Fixed issue 12 'Themes do not apply until app is restarted' http://code.google.com/p/andtweet/issues/detail?id=12.

http://code.google.com/p/andtweet/issues/detail?id=51'
Fixed Typo preventing Tweet sending (copy-past bug)
